Great apartment in new tower with the perfect view of the sun rise, and a very helpful host! The tower is currently being renovated/repaired from storm damage, so I didn't get to use the pool or restaurants. But the beach is right in front of your door, and you get a couple small restaurants in walking distance, as well as cafes, restaurants, karaoke places a 10 minute scooter drive away. Scooters are easy to rent through the host.

The place is a truly 5 stars place. Amazing views from a 28 floor balcony looking straight to a pristine beach. The apartment is luxurious and everything was pristine. Bed is extremely comfortable. The building is modern, smart and with anything you may need, and more. The host is friendly, responsive, and extremely professional.

Such a beautiful hotel-like feel for a great price. Location was remote, walking distance from the beach, and far from the city area, but close enough if you rent a scooter. They offer scooter rentals for 200k VND which made it very convenient; it even had a two-person raincoat that fit over your scooter for the rainy days. We loved the beautiful bathroom and balcony. Very clean space and had everything you'd need for a long stay. Washer-dryer unit was all in one and they also provided cleaning supplies. There were restaurants and a convenience store attached to the building. The host was very quick to respond and helpful. There's a rooftop bar, pool, gym, etc available too (I think the prices were 200k per day, but we didn't use it). We went when the beach was at low tide, it didn't seem like many people were swimming. But it was still nice to be there nonetheless. Lots of outdoor workout stations. And lots of new construction for future beach front properties/ hotels.
Absolutely one of the best experienced i have ever had on airbnb. The place was exactly like photos so clean, view was so beautiful. Will definitely be back if back in halong bay! Thank you

The breathtaking view of the ocean was truly the highlight of the experience, as seen from the balconyâ€”a perfect way to start and end the day. The host was incredibly responsive, ensuring a smooth and comfortable stay. I also appreciated the thoughtful guidebook provided, which was very helpful for exploring the area. I would highly recommend this property to anyone looking for a clean, comfortable, and serene getaway.
Only cons I felt is place is isolated from tourist area, so everyday I took taxi to some affordable restaurants (hotelâ€™s restaurant costs much) and tourist area.
But once again this place gives best view of Halong. I donâ€™t think theres a lot place like that.

Die Unterkunft war sauber und ordentlich. Alles wie beschrieben vorhanden.
Die Ausstattung ist neuwertig und hochwertig.
Der Pool war zu unserem Zeitpunkt leider geschlossen, daher keine Bewertung.

We had a lovely 2-day-1-night stay at Tonkin Ha Long. The apartment is spacious, clean, and beautifully decorated in a cozy Rustic-Indochine style. It has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a well-equipped kitchen, and a balcony with both sea and mountain views â€“ perfect for relaxing or taking photos.

Stayed here for a few days in Ha Long and do not regret. Hosts were very quick to respond and answered any questions we had. Location is great and the description of the airbnb was accurate. Great restaurants around the area as well. Would stay here again if we came back to Ha Long.

We had a blast!
Pros:
â€¢ The penthouse matched all the pictures with a fully-equipped kitchen. There were 6 wine glasses, plenty of shot glasses and lots of cooking utensils.
â€¢ All the decoration was done nicely and the lighting was great (bedrooms even had floor lights).
â€¢ The balcony was HUGE and even had a BBQ grill that we regretted not bringing food to use it.
â€¢ The host was very responsive and helpful, helping us in every way they could.
â€¢ There were 1-2 small grocery stores on the ground floor. They even sold ice!
â€¢ There was a Vietcombank ATM right at the entrance.
â€¢ This complex doesnâ€™t have much of a nice view but they have a large playground on the inner yard.
Cons:
â€¢ The TV in the master bedroom seemed like a domestic Chinese product, unlike the TV in the living room. We couldnâ€™t access anything with that Chinese-only display (no YouTube or Netflix buttons).
â€¢ There is no microwave in the kitchen.
â€¢ Ceiling/floor is not very thick or soundproof.
Highly recommended!

Truly a rare sanctuary. Peaceful, immaculate, and intuitively designed for both rest and productivity. Yet the true treasure is Hang. Her quiet generosity, discreet attentiveness, and graceful spirit imbue the home with soul. Her husband, equally kind and humble, adds to the warmth of the home with his good humor and hospitality. What was meant as a brief stay became a deeply healing chapter of nearly three months. We left with full hearts, grateful for every breeze, every sunrise, and every gentle kindness.
From the windows, youâ€™re not just gazing at a view youâ€™re witnessing the quiet majesty of a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Ha Long Bay stretches out like a living painting, shifting with light and mist in a way that never grows old.
Thereâ€™s even a fantastic restaurant right on the ground floor. Many of there dishes are beyond delicious and perfect after a long day of exploring.
This is more than a home it is a haven for those seeking meaning, beauty, and connection. 100/5 stars.

I recently had an unforgettable stay at Citadines Marina Halong Bay. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel welcome and safe. Thereâ€™s a little grocery downstairs open all day until 11pm. The hosts were especially amazing, they were always friendly, ready to help, and full of great local tips. A thoughtful New Yearâ€™s surprise even added that extra personal touch!
Waking up to the breathtaking views of Halong Bay, was a daily delight. Plus, the location is incredibly convenientâ€”just a short walk/drive away from popular attractions, dining spots, and boat tours.
If youâ€™re planning a trip to Halong Bay, I highly recommend Citadines Marina for its blend of stunning scenery, outstanding service, and prime accessibility. Itâ€™s perfect for couples, solo travelers, and I canâ€™t wait to go back!

This apartment feels like a five-star hotel experience. From my arrival, everything exceeded expectations. The full-length windows frame the most breathtaking views of Ha Long Bay â€” waking up to the mountains and water was unforgettable. The bed was heavenly to sink into, with crisp white sheets and comfortable pillows, and the whole apartment is immaculately clean. The bathroom has plentiful hot water and excellent water pressure, plus the luxury of lying in the bath while gazing out to the mountains â€” pure bliss.
The building itself is spectacular, with a sky bar on the 40th floor, a stunning infinity pool (especially magical at night), and even a beach right at the doorstep. The location is peaceful, yet for $1 you can hop on a motorbike and be in the centre of the tourist area.
Seamles check-in and attentive host making sure everything was perfect. If youâ€™re a solo traveller wanting a touch of luxury or a couple seeking a romantic escape, this place is perfection. I shall return.

heel indrukwekkende penthouse wanneer je binnenstapt, echter vallen al heel gauw een aantal zaken op: geen wc papier, beschadigde  vloer, beschadigde badkamermeubel, vlekken  in de keuken, schoonmaakvodden lagen nog in de badkamer, kapotte stoel op het terras, er hingen nog doeken/ handdoeken op het wasrek buiten,  .... allemaal in schril contrast met de grote en toch vrij recente penthouse. heel moeilijke communicatie met de host die dagen lang niet reageert. goed voor 1 nacht, meer zeker niet.

The condo view and location is great. The gym and restaurants in the building are the best part of this listing- thatâ€™s where the positives end. The kitchen was disgusting and unusable for the entire stay due to a horrible fish smell, mold, and old food in the sink. Mold and clumps of hair were present in all bathrooms. There is only one key card available that lets us access the roomâ€™s floor which makes difficulties for a group larger than two. There was no toilet paper in the room on the night we arrived and when we asked for more, we were only given 4 rolls for a one week stay with 4 people. There are few trash cans and they are all tiny and there is no way to empty the trash. It was confusing and unclear in how to get to the room because there are two sets of elevators in the building, one for the hotel and one for the condos where we were staying. Overall OK airBNB but could be much better.

The apartment was as described - 2 floor duplex with spectacular view throughout. Furnitures and appliances all worked well. We were able to check in 30 min earlier which was nice. Location is good and safe.
However, we have a few feedbacks for the host for future improvements:
- Host was cold and not responsive before our stay. When our booking was confirmed (3 days before check-in), she only sent us a phone number via airbnb app. We were confused and had to call multiple times to ask a few questions (parking, check in time, location). During our stay, she was responsive when we texted.
- The apartment had places that need to be cleaned more thoroughly (balcony) and higher window.
- The listing advertised the pool and amenities but we were not able to get in without purchasing extra, as they belong to the hotel which is in the same building. Host asked us to pay extra for tickets to the pool.
Overall, itâ€™s an okay stay for the view and the price, but definitely could be better.

We loved this apartment, and An A the host was absolutely incredible. She organised a car to take us from Hanoi to Ha Long Bay, gave us many recommendations for restaurants and nice spots in the area, organised the day cruise we took around the bay, answered all our questions about the hotel complex, and checked in on us consistently throughout our stay. When we needed a car to take us to our next stop on our trip, she organised a driver at a much lower price than the price offered by the buildingâ€™s reception. The apartment itself is very comfortable, with excellent air conditioning, a spacious bathroom, and a working kitchen. The only issue is that the elevators in the building could be unpredictable as the elevator card didnâ€™t seem to work, but when we brought this to her attention, An An assured us it would be fixed for the next guest. Altogether a lovely apartment managed by a fantastic host! Thanks so much!

Trang's place is warm, cozy, and quiet.  the bathroom is spacious and the heating lamp is a nice touch when you wake up on a cooler morning. the view was beautiful at night and i look forward to visiting again when the area has more time to develop. that being said i love the location as is for it traffic being very light and allowing one to get around easy. definitely a grat place to stay

Trang is a great host who ensured that our stay was comfortable, there were even some Christmas decorations to make it feel even more homey. The flat itself is beautifully designed, with a fully equipped kitchen and a huge bathroom.
The restaurant downstairs was very nice but a bit pricey and there were limited supermarket options near by so we ended up stocking up in Ha Long Bay City.

beautiful hotel/apartments. great view and delicious restaurant located at lobby floor. trang has been a tremendous help in planning pick ups and drop offs to my destinations. very quick for respond and very accommodating! i was here for one night and had to leave on a cruise the next day. i came back and needed a place to stay and decided to book here again as she made everything very easy for me. even assisting me with an early check in!

Located in a private beach area in BÃ£i ChÃ¡y, everything is within walking distance, and if not, easily accessible via booking an electric cart.

She made sure that everything was ready upon my arrival, even though my travel itinerary and schedule was a little bit unpredictable.
Itâ€™s a 10/10 experience for me, and Iâ€™d definitely stay at her place the next time I visit Ha Long.

We could not have had a better experience! Anan was amazing, so response, so helpful and simply the most perfect host. The apartment was lovely, and we loved Ha Long Bay! You can pay small additional fees to clean your clothes, swim and have breakfast at the hotel (which the apartment is part of). Anan organised a tour for us on the Bay, would recommend, we got picked up right outside the accommodation. They also organised taxis for us, thanks for the best stay!

Our stay was good. Halong bay town was a bit disappointing but the boat tour that Hahn recommended was great. The food on the boat was delicious. The Airbnb was located well and there was a really good Bahn mi place across the street. Hahn would answer all our questions right away. Showers had a nice water pressure.

I like Hanh's house very much. It is clean and has a view of the sea. It's close to the market and you can cook your own food. We also love our host Hanh, who is warm, friendly and patient. Ask her a lot of questions and she gives great answers. She also helped us book a boat to Halong Bay, which was a great experience. We will book her house again next time we come to Ha Long.

Hanh is a great host. She helped us with a tour of the bay and a ride back to Ha Noi. Her place is clean and comfortable and felt like home. There is lots of small shops and restaurants in the area and you can get a taxi to take you to other areas without any problems. Would recommend any of her places.

I stayed there for 2 nights. The apartment was clean and cozy, the bedroom had a beautiful sea view from above. The communication with Hang was also awesome, she always replied quickly. There is only one thing to consider before booking  is the location. It located a few km away from Bai Chay beach and more than 10km from Quang Ninh centre. So donâ€™t expect to go there by foots but it will not be a problem if you rent a motorbike. Finally I would say it worths the money.

This is one of the best places in the world. Among 100s of airbnbs we've visited this one is the best one we would definitely come back soon. After spending a month here we even started thinking to move to Vietnam forever. Apartment itself has a great view, everything is just working and super comfortable. I rarely write such a great review to a place. but this one is a real gem. High floor, nice place to walk, responsive and helping host. I just can't imagine what else I'd need

Perfect stay for 2 weeks!

Hangs place was fine for a couple of nights. Anymore and the shops downstairs would not have been enough for fresh foods like bread, butter, milk etc. We ate out mostly as only stayed for a few days.
The checking in was terrible, as we had real problems with the keyhole the host gave us, they had to eventually let us in by putting the code in remotely, not good!
We then had to use the key card, but even that we had problems with, as it kept being temperamental. However, we jjust left it whilst we went out and the next time we came back, it was okay and let us in.
The day of check out (friday 29th dec) there was drilling in the morning from the next door, which started about 7ish, not good if you had, had a late night before. Would of been nice for the host to have told us this would be happening.
The shower water was not very warm on the Friday morning of check out and we could not get the water in the kitchen sink to go warm at all, so therefore had to wash pots up in cold water!!!!!!

HÃ¢ng was friendly and super helpful all the time. She is a really nice host.
100% recommended â¤ï¸

With stayed 4 weeks. Clean and new, nice view, A/C quiet and efficient, nice kitchen, hot water, fresh market in the back of the street opened daily (affordable) and K-market is really good to find importations. Bed is hard, but they supply extra blankets if you ask for it. Really good internet. Quiet and safe area with families and children. You can use 'Grab' for taxi, they are usually more affordable. The manager of the place is super friendly and return messages really fast. We recommend it!

Lovely apartment with good views. Great host very responsive and helpful.
Few restaurants near the apartment but amenities available from mini mart downstairs. Approximately 10mins drive from port where the cruises depart from.

My stay at this apartment was absolutely incredible. The location was unbeatable, offering mesmerizing views of Ha Long Bay that made every moment memorable.
The apartment itself was impeccably clean, comfortable, and beautifully designed. Every amenity I needed was provided, ensuring a relaxing stay. The host was incredibly accommodating and easily contactable .
I highly recommend this apartment to anyone seeking a break with a view thatâ€™s simply unparalleled. Five stars, without a doubt!â€
View was very nice
Prachtig appartement met een heel mooi uitzicht.
very nice place :)

We just didn't know that the pool and jacuzzi were a seperate ticket, But the price was very reasonable.
We enjoyed the city very much and wish we could have stayed longer, next time we will definitely not change the place and the duration will be longer.
We would like to thank the host very much and recommend anyone to book with her without any doubt in the smallest details, because everything that is in the pictures we found in reality.
A great condo . Almost brand new,  with all the amenities.  A beautiful building with an ocean view .I recommend this to everyone . Ten out of ten .

Linh was very helpful and responsive to all our concerns and needs. She was able to help us book a motorbike for two days, even though we were only there for a short period. She even helped us book a private transfer from her condo to Cat Bi Airport, as we were traveling to Da Nang after our last day in Ha Long. To the condo, it was all modern and beautiful. It has all the amenities that was listed on the airbnb app. It was spotless, clean and very classy place. It has wide spaces and facing with a beautiful view of the Ha Long Beach and the bridge. The place is located 14 mins to the Ha Long International Cruise port where you can have your full day or hall day tour to Ha Long Bay, Ti Top Island, Sun Sot Cave and etc( P.S. depends on your package tourğŸ˜‰). The Sun World Ha Long where the Amusement Park, Cable Car and Ocean Park are is only 16 mins.away both are by motorbikeğŸ˜‰. The place is nice and beautiful. The host is very helpful and prompt to help us. Only a small note is that you can hear the neighbors bathroom during the night.

5 stars stay! We loved our 4-weeks stay. The apartment is very spacious, comfortable and modern. The entire space is very clean and the bed is super comfortable to sleep. The kitchen is well equipped to cook your own food, there was even oil, salt, sugar etc., while the kitchen utensils are more than enough. On the balcony there is a washing machine, making easy to do laundry when you need. There was also available drinkable water, which was very nice.
Communicating with the host was very easy from the beginning and also during our stay.
The location is also nice, since you can see the cable car and Ha Long Wheel, but also you can reach almost every site in the city in a couple of minutes.
If you want to enjoy a place where to feel like home in Ha Long City, this may be a great choice.

if youâ€™re looking for a beachside stay and prioritize comfort, cleanliness, and a well-maintained apartment, this is a great choice.

Minh Vui provided everything I needed for work: high-speed Wi-Fi, a comfortable desk and chair. And, of course, the bed was spacious and super cozy.
I highly recommend this wonderful apartment and its amazing host to everyone!

Minh Vuiâ€™s place is fantastic, the best weâ€™ve experienced so far in Vietnam. Minh Vui is also very responsive and friendly as a host. The room is comfortable, spacious and even luxurious for Vietnamese standards. The bed, couch area, small kitchenette and bathroom were very clean and tidy. Thereâ€™s a beautiful view from the bathtub across the room and to the Halong Bay limestone karsts. Thereâ€™s either an infinity pool with jacuzzis or indoor pool with jacuzzis accessible for 120 VND per person for 1 time use. Thereâ€™s a homemade/artisanal icecream shop (with limited flavours but very tasty and reasonable price) at the main floor of the building. Halong Bay isnâ€™t necessarily very pretty or very developed, so location-wise it was slightly disappointing to us (with no nice cafÃ©s or restaurants, or even shops at walking distance). Nevertheless, great place, would recommend for a relaxing comfortable stay!

Highly recommend Minh's place, it's a beautiful apartment with incredible views of Ha Long Bay! Very clean, and looked just like the pictures. Minh was very responsive and helpful, and helped us make the most of our stay!
The AirBnB is a little bit away from the main city, which is very peaceful and relaxing. However while there are some good restaurants nearby, it's a bit of a walk to get downtown. Definitely recommend renting a scooter, or using Grab for quick access to everything Ha Long has to offer

I cannot fault anything about the apartment and the bay view is stunning. The restaurant food is amazing, and there is a shop on the ground floor for your snacks, drinks and all those small incidentals. The staff are super helpful and friendly, I will definitely come back!

I can fully recommend everything about the place, and with this host you will never have any trouble! She is a gem :)

I had a wonderful stay at this modern and spotless apartment. The sea view was absolutely stunning, and the location made it the perfect place to relax. The host was incredibly friendly and helpful, even assisting us with luggage after check-out. It was a truly memorable experience, and Iâ€™ll definitely come back in the future!

This is one of the airbnb that I love so much. Without any complaint I can give. Everything is perfect and I wish to stay one more night if can. Next time surely will back again. The four season pool is nice just need to pay extra, but itâ€™s good option for me esp with baby . Can relax there due the weather changed cold we donâ€™t go on cruise but jacuzzi . I love this unit so much!

We were only staying for one night before heading to Ha Long for a cruise so it was the perfect place to relax and get some washing done. The washer/dryer worked perfectly and we had a lovely view of the bay.
We went for a walk in the area but noticed there wasnâ€™t a whole lot to do or many people around - a lot of nearby buildings turned out to be vacant, which explains why.
The apartment has a smart tv however the only app that can be used on it (as confirmed with the host whilst there) is YouTube.
Overall, it was the perfect place to stay for one night being so close (13 minutes) from where the cruises at Ha Long Bay take off from :)

An experience i will never forget. From the moment i arrived i was welcomed by host Hieu who made himself available assisting me in my planning the 2 days in Halong Bay.
The room is exceptional . The hotel has magnificent infinity pool with views beyond belief.
Vietnam continues to amaze me

This is a great spot if youâ€™re looking for a place to stay in Ha Long. Itâ€™s a multi purpose building with shops and great buffet in the lobby for breakfast, convenient transportation options nearby. New place and modern.
Apartment was super clean, amazing view over the water and for sunset. Short taxi journey to bars and restaurants. Would highly recommend, one of the best Airbnbâ€™s Iâ€™ve had in Vietnam.

The area is beautiful, and the hotel where the Airbnb is located offers plenty of amenities. However, most of them are overpriced, and the food at the hotel restaurant didnâ€™t live up to the cost. While itâ€™s clear theyâ€™re trying to make the area more upscale, just a 10â€“15 minute walk away it becomes noticeably run down, with abandoned shops. It was difficult to find nearby spots to eat or grab a drink, so we often had to call a Grab taxi to get around. That said, the view from the air bnb was absolutely stunning! The 2 in 1 washer and dryer was nice to have too!

Ha Van was amazing from start to finish. It was out of season so there wasnâ€™t a huge amount to do.
She had Hieu come in everyday and we felt very well looked after. He answered all of our questions and helped us find places to go and even found the tea we like. Amazing service! Thank you both of you
Thank you

De kamer ziet eruit als op de fotos en heeft een mooi uitzicht. Wij hadden meerdere problemen met het internet, de televisie en warm water. De host reageerde snel en wilde altijd helpen. Dit ging alleen niet zo snel als wij gehoopt hadden.
Voor ons was de grootste teleurstelling de omgeving. Het is vrij afgelegen en wordt helemaal ingericht voor tourisme. Er zijn geen normale supermarkten in de buurt en ook weinig eetgelegenheden. De prijzen zijn allemaal veel hoger dan de rest van Vietnam en de kwaliteit naar onze mening veel lager. Verder is er weinig te doen en ben je erg afhankelijk van taxi's.
Ook schrokken we van de kosten van het zwembad en de sportschool. Zwemmen kost per keer meer dan 7 euro voor twee mensen en je kaartje is geldig voor of het binnenzwembad of het buitenzwembad. Als je beide wilt gebruiken of later op de dag terug wilt komen, moet je een nieuw kaartje kopen. Het zelfde geldt voor de sportschool.
Really great place to stay. Fit the photos and very clear apartment. Highly recommend.
